reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.feedback: Dr. Ali is a great teacher with a deep understanding of algorithms. The lectures are engaging and well-organized.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.feedback: Dr. Khan makes complex concepts easy to understand and is always willing to help outside of class.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.feedback: Dr. Yusuf is knowledgeable but sometimes his explanations can be a bit confusing.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.feedback: Dr. Farooq's classes are well-structured and his experiments are interesting. However, the grading can be strict.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.feedback: Dr. Rahman is passionate about biology and makes the subject very engaging. His exams are fair and well-designed.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.feedback: Dr. Javed's lectures are often disorganized and hard to follow. The subject matter is interesting but poorly delivered.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.feedback: Dr. Hussain provides clear explanations and practical examples. The course is challenging but rewarding.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.feedback: Dr. Raza is knowledgeable, but his lectures can be monotonous and lack interaction.

reviews.subject: Control Systems
reviews.feedback: Dr. Qureshi is excellent in teaching control systems. His hands-on approach makes complex concepts easier to grasp.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.feedback: Dr. Siddiqui's lectures are engaging and well-researched. He has a knack for bringing historical events to life.

reviews.subject: Electrical Engineering
reviews.feedback: Dr. Ali has good knowledge but could improve in explaining practical applications of electrical theories.

reviews.subject: Astronomy
reviews.feedback: Dr. Noor's enthusiasm for astronomy is contagious. The hands-on projects and night sky observations are fantastic.

reviews.subject: Geology
reviews.feedback: Dr. Ahmed is very knowledgeable about geology and uses real-world examples to make the material relatable.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.feedback: Dr. Shah's commitment to environmental issues is evident. The course is well-organized and informative.

reviews.subject: Mechanical Engineering
reviews.feedback: Dr. Malik excels in teaching mechanical engineering principles with practical, hands-on approaches and real-world applications.

reviews.subject: Literature
reviews.feedback: Dr. Rehman has a good knowledge of literature but the class could benefit from more structured discussions.

reviews.subject: Business Management
reviews.feedback: Dr. Qazi's practical approach to business management is valuable. The case studies and group projects are well-designed.

reviews.subject: Finance
reviews.feedback: Dr. Ahmed covers a lot of material but the lectures can be overwhelming. More clarity in explanations would help.

reviews.subject: Computer Engineering
reviews.feedback: Dr. Iqbal's course is challenging but rewarding. His practical approach and real-world examples enhance learning.

reviews.subject: Civil Engineering
reviews.feedback: Dr. Hassan is thorough and ensures students understand the fundamentals. His projects are challenging but highly educational.
